```{r}
library(tidyverse)
source("https://bioconductor.org/biocLite.R")  
biocLite("phyloseq")  
library(phyloseq)  

load("mothur_phyloseq.RData")
#load("qiime2_phyloseq.RData")

Tax_Table = mothur@tax_table


Tax_DF = data.frame(Tax_Table)

Tax_DF %>% select(Genus) %>% filter(Genus != "uncultured")

```
